headline: AM Best Affirms Credit Ratings of Globe Life Inc. and Its Subsidiaries
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., November 12, 2025--AM Best has affirmed the Financial Strength Rating (FSR) of A (Excellent) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Ratings (Long-Term ICR) of "a+" (Excellent) of the key life/health subsidiaries of Globe Life Inc. (Globe Life) (headquartered in McKinney, TX) [NYSE: GL]. Concurrently, AM Best has affirmed the Long-Term ICR of "bbb+" (Good) of Globe Life. AM Best also has affirmed the Short- and Long-Term Issue Credit Ratings (Short-Term IR; Long-Term IR) and the indicativ
